text: Love Hurts is a compilation album by Jon B. consisting of love songs from his first two albums, Bonafide and Cool Relax. ==Track listing== #"Pretty Girl" #"Time After Time" #"They Don't Know" #"Don't Say" #"Pants Off" #"Simple Melody" #"Gone Before Light" #"Cool Relax" #"Bad Girl" #"Love Hurts" Category:1999 compilation albums Category:Albums produced by Tim & Bob Category:Epic Records compilation albums Category:Jon B. compilation albums
title: Love Hurts (Jon B. album)
